pullRequest.title: XRDDEV-977
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add scheduled global conf checker:

Implement scheduled global conf checker that updates changes in global conf to serverconf db.
Add helper class to provide unauthenticated access to required service layer methods.
Add required methods to GlobalConfFacade.
Disable globalconf updates for slaves in clustered setup.
Start using server owner caching in service classes.

commit.message:
XRDDEV-977 Add scheduled global conf checker

- Implement scheduled global conf checker that updates changes in global conf to serverconf db.
- Add helper class to provide unauthenticated access to required service layer methods.
- Add required methods to GlobalConfFacade.
XRDDEV-977 Disable globalconf updates for slaves in clustered setup

XRDDEV-977 Implement Security Server owner cache

- Add Security Server owner cache as request scoped bean.

XRDDEV-977 Start using server owner caching

- Start using server owner caching in service classes.
- Update tests.

nodes.bodyText: The idea of the facade is to convert all static methods into Spring bean methods for better testability. I think that the getServerOwner is not actually supposed to be static and should be invoked from the bean instance instead.
Preferably use constructor DI if possible. If it does not for some reason work here then this is fine.
Maybe use signerProxyFacade bean instead of SignerProxy to be consistent with the proxy-ui-api codebase
Seems to throw a CodedException which is a RuntimeException so the Exception is a bit confusing in the method signature.

Not sure if it actually adds any value to wrap the caught runtime exception into a JobExecutionException (which is a Quartz exception - even though Quartz is not used here).
But yeah this class seems to be pretty much a direct copy from the old codebase so I don't really have an opinion whether or not this (whole class) should be refactored in any way
Wrapping the SignerClient.execute in the SignerProxyFacade would make this more testable.

commit.message: XRDDEV-977 Use constructor dependency injection in GlogalConfChecker
XRDDEV-977 Change GlobalConfFacade.getServerOwner from static to instance method
XRDDEV-977 Use SigerProxyFacade instead of SignerProxy
XRDDEV-977 Throw Exception instead of Quartz JobExecutionException
XRDDEV-977 Remove throws from method signature
